ygData.subject: SBLive crashes (was Powerleveling doesnt mean L50 + rant)
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a SBLive and haven t run into any problems yet (knock on wood).  To be on the safe side, yesterday I downloaded the most recent drivers from the
ygData.messageBody:
I have a SBLive and haven't run into any problems yet (knock on wood). To
be on the safe side, yesterday I downloaded the most recent drivers from the
Creative website and installed them. I was shocked when I logged in. Prior
to installing the updated drivers, the sound in EQ was pretty good. After
installing the new drivers, it got even better. The Environmental Audio
support improved dramatically. I started hearing sound effects that I
didn't even know were in the game. The most recent SBLive driver is from
Nov 99 so if you don't have it download it and give it a try.


Galtin of E'ci

> I'm living there until I can play EQ again for more then 30 minutes
> without my SB Live crashing me out.
